articles.title: Apple leases 1.16 lakh sq ft in Bengaluru for 10 years, to pay ₹2.43 cr per month | Mint - Mint
articles.description: A commercial building in Bengaluru has been leased by Apple for a starting monthly rent of  ₹2.43 crore. The leased floors of the building in Cubbon Road will serve as a global capability centre for the tech giant.
articles.content: Apple has leased several floors of a commercial building in Bengaluru with a starting monthly rent of 2.43 crore. The premises of the commercial building on Cubbon Road - built by Prestige Estates Pr… [+1772 chars]

articles.description: The Crab Nebula has been seen like never before, courtesy NASA's IXPE techniques.
articles.content: The Crab Nebula has been part of several studies by astronomers. It began back on February 22, 1971, when a sounding rocket took off carrying specialized sensors directed towards the Crab Nebula from… [+2274 chars]

articles.title: 'Hubble trouble' could deepen with new measurement of the universe's expansion - Space.com
articles.description: Physicists have improved the accuracy of a technique that uses variable stars to measure distances in the universe, providing a new figure for its expansion rate.
